name: Bay Area Flying Club
about: The Bay Area Flying Club, based in Livermore, California, is a premier pilot flight training school and flying club. Established to provide a professional and enjoyable environment for aviation enthusiasts, the club offers airplane rental and comprehensive pilot training programs. Our team of highly qualified and safety-conscious flight instructors are selected for their exceptional knowledge, experience, and commitment to excellence, exceeding FAA requirements. We foster a community of professional aviators, competent communicators, and punctual individuals who are fun to be around. Our fleet includes a variety of aircraft suitable for local and extended trips, ensuring a diverse and engaging flying experience. At Bay Area Flying Club, we prioritize personal growth and safety, making learning to fly an enriching and enjoyable journey for all our members.
services:
["Annual Recurrent Training
Biennial Flight Review
Ground School
Intro Flight
